title: Report
description: A report object provides supplemental information about a report

delimiter.description: The delimiter character such as , or ;

cardKey.description: Ancestor of the cards that will be exported as CSV. Used to override the default cardKey, which is the cardKey of the card, in which the report macro is used

cardType.description: The card key of the cards that will be included in the CSV data

fields.description: An array of field names that will be included in the CSV data
